home.title: The simple and fast solution for all your file transfers
home.subtitle: Secure and fast file transfer
home.disclaimer: Wildtransfer is a study project created by students from the Wild Code School. For security reasons, we advise you not to provide sensitive or personal information. Use temporary emails to register, as well as passwords different from those you usually use, and do not share sensitive files.

about.title: About Wild Transfer
about.subtitle: A modern platform to transfer your files with peace of mind
about.description1: is a simple, fast and secure solution for file sharing. It is designed for both professionals and individuals, with an intuitive interface designed for a smooth experience.
about.description2: Our mission is to provide a reliable service that respects your privacy. We use modern technologies to ensure the security and confidentiality of your data.
about.description3: Developed by a team of developers, the platform is constantly evolving to meet new uses and offer features adapted to your needs.
about.contactText: For any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us via the

step1.title: Create your account
step1.description: Sign up for free in seconds to access all our features.

step2.title: Transfer your files
step2.description: Upload your files securely. We support all common formats.

step3.title: Manage and share
step3.description: Organize your files and share them easily with your contacts.

security.title: Maximum security
security.description: Your files are encrypted and stored securely.

transfer.description: Transfer your files quickly with our optimized infrastructure.

contacts.description: Organize your contacts and share your files easily.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is available to help you at any time.
